p.span: The District continues to be vigilant in monitoring the most up-to-date information regarding COVID-19 directly from the health care professionals responsible, at the federal, state and county health levels. This page includes District communications, information, documents, useful links and resources about the Coronavirus to keep the East Williston School District community informed with the latest information as it becomes available.

U.S. Center for Disease Control (CDC) Website

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Verdana; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

a.span: New York State Department of Health

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Verdana; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Verdana; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We would also like to remind everyone, staff and families, of the preventive health guidelines established by the CDC (Center for Disease Control) that we use in school and encourage being followed at home.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Verdana; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Verdana; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Verdana; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth with unwashed hands.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Verdana; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Stay home when you are sick.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Verdana; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Cover your cough or sneeze with a tissue and throw the tissue into the trash. If a tissue is not immediately available, cough or sneeze into your elbow.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Verdana; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.
